thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: The All-Star Who Took Spring Training Off

author: Jared Diamond
title: The All-Star Who Took Spring Training Off
text:
It is an annual tradition of March for veteran baseball players to complain about spring training. It’s way too long, they say, it’s mind-numbingly tedious and there is a constant risk of injury while playing games that don’t count.
This year, one All-Star took an unusual—and potentially revolutionary—approach to combat these issues: He skipped most of it.
Washington...
